column5: I am heading out in 47 hours.... first time to Canada..... cannot wait....will be there for a week. Never have fished for walleye or pike before. (don't have too many in South Arkansas)... will try to post results when I get back. (i have learned a lot from WC....hope I can make it work)

Well welcome to Canada and I hope you have a great trip up there. I was up in the area a few weeks back and the fishing was great then. I'm sure the lodge staff will give you lots of tips to make your trip successful. Enjoy and give us a report when you return. Mike
